content: Can someone send me a link on the instructions for porting a module to backdrop? I need to port IMCE for filefield and can't find them. I know they're there, probably just having a brain fart
I think that's part of why the Documentation Initiative needs to exist and be done.

oadaeh (Jason Flatt) said:

You mean this?: https://api.backdropcms.org/converting-modules-from-drupal

Yes, thank you!!! I knew it was there and couldn't find it - it may be an issue of searching documentation not that great???? Or could easily be me today.

@Elisabeth Garbeil It is an unofficial version: https://github.com/VasasA/converting/blob/master/converting.md

VasasA/converting
Converting modules to Backdrop from Drupal 7. Contribute to VasasA/converting development by creating an account on GitHub.

[Updated] @Elisabeth Garbeil Let me point out the Coder Upgrade module, which I've found very useful for taking care of many of the routine conversions in the modules I've ported. https://backdropcms.org/project/coder_upgrade
@bugfolder I think you intended that for @Elisabeth Garbeil ;-)

Attila Vasas said:

Elisabeth Garbeil It is an unofficial version: https://github.com/VasasA/converting/blob/master/converting.md

Thanks, @Attila Vasas !

bugfolder said:

[Updated] Elisabeth Garbeil Let me point out the Coder Upgrade module, which I've found very useful for taking care of many of the routine conversions in the modules I've ported. https://backdropcms.org/project/coder_upgrade

Gracias, @bugfolder ! I've bookmarked both for when I'm ready to start the port.
